body.name: Playtex Baby Nurser Pre-Sterilized Disposable Drop-Ins Bottle Liners, Closer to Breastfeeding, 4 Oz, 100 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 7 mins
features: ADAPTABLE CONVENIENCE: Say goodbye to the limitations of traditional bottles. With Playtex Baby Refillable Liners, you have the freedom to use your preferred formula or breast milk. Fill the reusable liners with ease and customize your baby's feeding to perfection.
EXPERIENCE THE PERFECT BLEND OF INNOVATION AND PRACTICALITY: Our refillable liners fit seamlessly into our specially designed bottle holders, offering a secure and leak-resistant feeding solution
TAILOR EACH FEEDING TO YOUR BABY'S UNIQUE NEEDS: Adjust the amount of milk or formula with precision, ensuring that your little one receives the ideal nourishment for growth and development.

EFFORTLESS ON-THE-GO ADVENTURES: Designed with your active lifestyle in mind, Playtex Baby Refillable Liners are your reliable companion for family outings, road trips, and everyday adventures. Experience feeding convenience wherever life takes you.

TRUSTED SAFETY: We understand the importance of your baby's well-being. Our refillable liners are crafted from high-quality, BPA-free materials, providing a safe and hygienic environment for your little one's nourishment.
body.description: Discover the ultimate solution for hassle-free feeding and maximum convenience with Playtex Baby's Disposable Drop-In Liners. Designed to enhance your baby's feeding experience while minimizing cleanup, these liners are available in two convenient sizes – 4 ounces and 8 ounces – and are offered in both 50-count and 100-count packs for your flexibility and peace of mind. Our innovative Drop-In Liners are a game-changer for parents, providing a hygienic and time-saving alternative to traditional bottles. Simply drop a liner into the Nurser Bottle, fill it with formula or breast milk, and let your baby enjoy a seamless feeding experience. Afterward, discard the liner for quick and easy cleanup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we needed
reviews.reviewText: Our 3 month old combo feeds so we are very picky about our bottles. We chose to try disposable liners right now to save water/money. Our water usage this month determines our next few months water bills. If you know, you know! And we wash/sanitize a LOT of bottles! We went with the 8oz bottle because it will grow with his appetite. Will take 4oz and 8oz liners. He latched to the nipple with no problem (which can be a problem if baby is also BF). You fill them up like normal (yes, I even filled a different bottle first and then poured into bag to make sure measurements were correct with the wrinkled liners) and then I take the end of our bottle brush and shove it into the end of the bottle and push out as much air as I can. When baby is done you toss the liner and wash or wipe the nipple with bottle wipes. Super easy! No leaking at all and the liners are thin but tough. No bags have broken while I was forcefully shoving air out of them. At the end of the day I throw the nipples and nipple rings into a sterilizer bag for 3 minutes and my bottle washing for the day is done. And perfect for travel or a day out if you get the bottle cleaner wipes too. Playtex Baby and Tommee Tippee have made our feeding journey very easy =).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like that it has a hard bottom. Also you can fit 10oz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these old school bottles for my grandbaby and I love them they help eliminate gas and fussiness that comes along with feedings. I hadn’t seen drop in bottles and liners in years. I’m glad I found these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality and love the drop in bags
reviews.reviewText: Very nice quality with the cool drop in bags. The only issue i had is the opening where u need to put ur fingers in to squeeze the air out has a lip on it that comes into the bottle making the opening hard to get ur fingers in and it is a rough plastic so it doesn’t feel good on ur fingers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best Bottles but not sealed package
reviews.reviewText: I have used these bottles 7 years ago for my first son and now with my newborn. They are the best. My problem with this order is I received the box and it had no plastic sealed box like it usually does when I buy the liners and the box was bent as if it had been opened. That is concerning considering this is for my newborn son. Feedings are not something you want to take risk with when leaving your baby with a sitter. No one wants their child meal time to be compromised. I took the liners out to check them it looked like all of the 100 weren’t there so I counted each and they definitely were in the box so that was a relief. Typically ordering from Amazon I have no complaints on products or delivery. Overall I recommend the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Came in just as pictured! These bottles and liners are great if you’re breastfeeding and are needing to use bottles. The nipple is like a breast! They’re super convenient and so easy to just throw the liner away!

reviews.reviewText: Not the most eco-friendly product however as a first-time mom I was thankful for this suggestion because it does make the cleanup super easy and that definitely adds up in the quality of life aspect.
